title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.181 - Maintenance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.181 - Maintenance

State Regulations

The keeping of property at a standard of operating
condition; also, the expense involved. Example: recurring operations of
cleaning, oiling, repairing and adjusting. Maintenance cost includes outlays
for: (a) labor and supplies; (b) the replacement of any parts that
constitute less than a retirement unit; and
(c) major overhauls, the item of which may
involve elements of the first two classes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.181

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
